definition: horizontal/across/crosswise/horizontal stroke (in Chinese characters)/to place (sth) flat (on a surface)/to cross (a river, etc)/in a jumble/chaotic/(in fixed expressions) harsh and unreasonable/violent
thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)

sentences.english: Underline the infinitives in the following sentences and tell their functions.
sentences.chinese: 用横线划出下列句子中的不定式，并说出它们的作用。

sentences.english: Write the numbers on the lines in the chart.
Use the Pencil Tool to add a horizontal 1px white line under the heading.
sentences.chinese: 用铅笔工具在头部的下面画一条1px的横线。

sentences.english: Of all lines, a horizontal line feels the most peaceful.
sentences.chinese: 在所有的线中，横线让人感觉最平和。

sentences.english: So that means I take one row at a time.
sentences.chinese: 这意味着一次只画一条横线。

sentences.english: Horizontal lines appear calm and at rest, because they are parallel to the surface of the Earth.
sentences.chinese: 因为横线与地表平行，所以显得平静安详。

sentences.english: Draw two vertical lines and a horizonal one to make an H.
sentences.chinese: 画两条竖线和一条横线就构成了H。

sentences.english: The permanence and reliability of horizontal and vertical lines is also frequently leveraged in both classical and modern art.
sentences.chinese: 横线加竖线的永久与可靠也常用于古典与现代艺术中。

sentences.english: Mark through any unused spaces with a single line and initial and date.
sentences.chinese: 在没有使用的空白处划上横线，签上姓名和日期。

sentences.english: Fill in the blanks with the finals you hear and mark their tones.
sentences.chinese: 在横线上填出你听到的韵母及声调。

sentences.english: Horizontal lines also divide the space.
Responses below the line are introverted and internal.
sentences.chinese: 图中横线以下的反应，都是个人内在的反应。

sentences.english: The succession of horizontal lines along the rooftops and landscape also helps to convey a sense of depth.
sentences.chinese: 沿屋顶和山水的一连串横线还帮助传递出深度之感。

sentences.english: Fill in the blanks according to the patterns found.
sentences.chinese: 在面各题中的数是依规律排列，横线上应填甚么数？

definition: broken line (continuous figure made up of straight line segments)/polygonal line/dog leg
to delineate/to draw a line/to underline
dash/Chinese dash ── (punct., double the length of the western dash)
